statusLine.command: input=$(cat); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); style=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.output_style.name'); remaining=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.remaining_percentage // empty'); if [ -n "$remaining" ]; then echo "$model | Context: $remaining% | Style: $style"; else echo "$model | Style: $style"; fi
